messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Oh, please, hurry. This is 19 Windham Court. We've got somebody in the house here with a gun, and he's threatening all three of us.
Okay, who is it?
Oh, my God, he's shooting again!
All right, who is he shooting at?
I don't know! He's shooting at my girlfriend's daughter.
Hold on one second. Does she have a restraining order against him?
Yes, she has a restraining order against him, and he won't leave us alone. Oh, please, hurry!
All right, 19 Windham Court in Arlington Heights, right?
Yes, please, hurry!
Is anyone hurt?
I don't know. Oh, my God. What is he doing?
Ma'am, what does he look like?
He's about 25 years old, I'd say. I'm not sure.
Okay, does your daughter have a restraining order against him?
Yes, she does.
Okay, what type of weapon does he have?
I think it's a handgun. Oh, there's a cop here!
Okay, are the police there now?
I don't know, but please hurry! He's got a gun!
9-1-1, what's your emergency? Someone just shot a cop!
Okay, where are you?
I'm in the house.
Do you still have a weapon on you?
Yes, and if anyone comes down here, I'm shooting.
Where in the house are you?
I'm in the basement.
Do you have anyone else with you in the basement?
Yes, my girlfriend is here.
Is she okay?
Yes, but if anyone comes down here, I'm shooting.
Okay, let's calm down. What's your name?
Eric Anderson.
Okay, Eric, don't shoot anyone else, alright? Just stay on the phone with me.
I already shot a cop. I need help.
We're sending help. Stay on the phone and stay calm. Don't hurt anyone else.
Police and fire department, how can I help you?
Hi, my daughter and her mother are being held hostage by my daughter's ex-boyfriend. He shot a police officer.
Okay, and what is your name?
My name is [REDACTED], and I'm in Las Vegas.
Did you text your daughter back?
No, I didn't.
Okay, I recommend you text her back to acknowledge her and tell her you're doing everything you can to help.
Alright, I'll do that.
What else did she tell you in the messages?
She said she was moved and is being held in a basement. They can see her in a window well.
Alright, we'll pass that information to the officers.
Thank you.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I have a friend being held hostage right now at gunpoint.
Where is this happening?
It's at Arlington Heights Road and Palatine Road.
What information do you have?
She's been communicating with me via text. She's in the basement, and her phone is about to die.
Okay, what else did she tell you?
She said he's pacing back and forth, and he shot at her mom.
Is this new information?
No, this was within the past hour.
Alright, and is her mom with them?
I don't know.
When did she tell you her phone might die?
About 20 minutes ago.
Okay, thanks for the update. We'll let the officers know. If you hear anything else, call us back.
Alright, thank you.
Hello, this is Brian.
Hi, Brian. My daughter called and she's in a squad car now.
That's great news. I'm glad she's safe.
I just wanted to tell you how wonderful you all have been. Thank you so much.
Thank you, sir. I'm glad everything worked out.
